title: xayah can ult while cc'd
body: was playing versus a xayah as lux, happened to me three times in one game where i landed my snare and her then combo'd  e/r but she ults and dodges the combo even though she was already snared

replies.body:
I believe that she is supposed to be able to ult during a snare. If she's moving around while snared though, that's a bug.

Don't quote me on this, I'm not completely sure.
I am 99% certain you are correct.

first rioter i see on report a bug boards, can i tell you some of the bugs i know? Don't tell me you only watch xayah bugs. 

if i can, do they have to be sfx, vfx, or gameplay ones?
IKR bug report is basically a wasteland of shit posts that rito doesn't touch with a 10 foot pole.
that's why xD. I reported the illaoi W bug 5 months ago, and it has only been fixed recently

This is working as intended. Xayah can ult while snared, due to the fact that the main part of her ult is the Untargetable and damage. But, she will not be able to move until the snare wears off. Unlike Fizz's Playful/Trickster, where the idea behind it was more for mobility
